body_html: Are there some requirements for installing and building tensorflow, I installed on centOS 7.2 using pip install following the instructions on tensorflow.org . Is it necessary for me to build it from source in order to run the distributed tensor flow ? Or is it necessary to build from the newest source in order to run distributed tensor flow?

body: Are there some requirements for installing and building tensorflow, I installed on centOS 7.2 using pip install following the instructions on tensorflow.org .
